entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 26 with temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
